attributes.name: content-security-policy
attributes.content: img-src 'self' data: https://blockchain.info; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; frame-src 'none'; script-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' *.blockchain.info wss://*.blockchain.info https://blockchain.info; object-src 'none'; media-src 'none'; font-src 'self';
